name: TFT_Item_BfSword
description: Gain Attack Damage.

name: TFT_Item_RecurveBow
description: Gain Attack Speed.

name: TFT_Item_NeedlesslyLargeRod
description: Gain Ability Power.

name: TFT_Item_TearOfTheGoddess
description: Gain Mana.

name: TFT_Item_ChainVest
description: Gain Armor.

name: TFT_Item_NegatronCloak
description: Gain Magic Resist.

name: TFT_Item_GiantsBelt
description: Gain Health.

name: TFT_Item_Spatula
description: It must do something...

name: TFT_Item_SparringGloves
description: Gain Critical Strike Chance and Dodge Chance.

name: TFT_Item_Deathblade
description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: TFT_Item_GiantSlayer
description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do bonus damage. If the target has more health, the bonus damage increases.

name: TFT_Item_HextechGunblade
description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for a percentage of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder.

name: TFT_Item_SpearOfShojin
description: The holder's Basic Attacks restore additional Mana.

name: TFT_Item_EdgeOfNight
description: When the holder drops below 60% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains bonus attack speed.

name: TFT_Item_Bloodthirster
description: Physical damage heals the holder for a percentage of the damage dealt. Upon falling below a percentage Health, the holder gains a shield based on their max Health that lasts several seconds.

name: TFT_Item_ZekesHerald
description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: TFT_Item_ShimmerscaleEmblem
description: The holder gains the Shimmerscale trait.

name: TFT_Item_InfinityEdge
description: Grants Critical Strike Chance (including components) and Critical Strike damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.

name: TFT_Item_RapidFirecannon
description: Increases the holder's Attack Range and grants bonus Attack Speed (including components). The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

name: TFT_Item_GuinsoosRageblade
description: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.

name: TFT_Item_StatikkShiv
description: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist for several seconds.

name: TFT_Item_TitansResolve
description: When the holder takes damage or inflicts a critical strike, they gain a stacking Attack Damage and Ability Power bonus.  This stacks up to a limit, at which point the holder gains Armor and Magic Resistance.

name: TFT_Item_RunaansHurricane
description: The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing a percentage of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

name: TFT_Item_ZzrotPortal
description: At the start of combat, the holder taunts nearby enemies. When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.

name: TFT_Item_RagewingEmblem
description: The holder gains the Ragewing trait.

name: TFT_Item_LastWhisper
description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced for several seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: TFT_Item_RabadonsDeathcap
description: Grants bonus Ability Power (including components).

name: TFT_Item_ArchangelsStaff
description: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain Ability Power equal to a percentage of their maximum Mana (this bonus applies to that Ability cast).

name: TFT_Item_WintersApproach
description: winter is coming

name: TFT_Item_LocketOfTheIronSolari
description: When combat begins, the holder and nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks damage for several seconds.

name: TFT_Item_IonicSpark
description: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.

name: TFT_Item_Morellonomicon
description: When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing for the duration of the burn.

name: TFT_Item_DragonmancerEmblem
description: The holder gains the Dragonmancer trait.

name: TFT_Item_JeweledGauntlet
description: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.

name: TFT_Item_BlueBuff
description: After casting their Ability, the holder gains Mana.

name: TFT_Item_FrozenHeart
description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies.

name: TFT_Item_ChaliceOfPower
description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: TFT_Item_Redemption
description: Periodically, the holder radiates an aura to nearby allies, healing them a percentage of their missing Health. Affected allies take reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for several seconds.

name: TFT_Item_MageEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Mage trait.

name: TFT_Item_HandOfJustice
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder's basic attacks and spells deal additional damage and heal for a percentage of damage dealt. At the beginning of each planning phase, one of these buffs is increased.

name: TFT_Item_BrambleVest
description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal magic damage to all nearby enemies every couple seconds.

name: TFT_Item_GargoyleStoneplate
description: The holder gains Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

name: TFT_Item_SunfireCape
description: Periodically, a random nearby enemy is burned a percentage of their maximum Health over several seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced.

name: TFT_Item_CavalierEmblem
description: The holder gains the Cavalier trait.

name: TFT_Item_Shroud
description: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana until they cast.

name: TFT_Item_DragonsClaw
description: Grants bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from an Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Health.

name: TFT_Item_Zephyr
description: When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

name: TFT_Item_MirgeEmblem
description: The holder gains the Mirage trait.

name: TFT_Item_Quicksilver
description: The holder gains immunity to crowd control in combat for several seconds.

name: TFT_Item_WarmogsPride
description: Grants bonus Health (including components).

name: TFT_Item_GuardianEmblem
description: The holder gains the Guardian trait.

name: TFT_Item_BansheesClaw
description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

name: TFT_Item_TacticiansCrown
description: The holder's maximum team size is incrased.

name: TFT_Item_AssassinEmblem
description: The holder gains the Assassin trait.

name: TFT_Item_ThiefsGloves
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level. [Consumes Three Item Slots]

name: TFT7_Item_AstralEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Astral trait.

name: TFT_Item_BruiserEmblem
description: The holder gains the Bruiser trait.

name: TFT7_Item_CannoneerEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Cannoneer trait.

name: TFT7_Item_EvokerEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Evoker trait.

name: TFT7_Item_GuildEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Guild trait.

name: TFT7_Item_JadeEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Jade trait.

name: TFT7_Item_LegendEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Legend trait.

name: TFT7_Item_MysticEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Mystic trait.

name: TFT7_Item_RevelEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Revel trait.

name: TFT7_Item_ScalescornEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Scalescorn trait.

name: TFT7_Item_SwiftshotEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Swiftshot trait.

name: TFT7_Item_TempestEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Tempest trait.

name: TFT7_Item_WarriorEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Warrior trait.

name: TFT7_Item_WhispersEmblemItem
description: The holder gains the Warrior trait.

name: TFT_Item_AnimaVisage
description: The wearer regenerates Health each second.

name: TFT_Item_DeathsDefiance
description: Grants Omnivamp. The damage the wearer receives is instead dealt over 5 seconds as non-lethal damage.

name: TFT_Item_EternalWinter
description: Enemies who damage the wearer have their Attack Speed slowed for 2 seconds. After being slowed this way 7 times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every 10 seconds.

name: TFT_Item_GoldCollector
description: The wearer executes enemies below 10% health on-hit. Executions during PvP rounds have a 50% chance to generate 1 gold.

name: TFT_Item_InfinityForce
description: Gain Armor, Attack Damage, Attack Speed, Critical Strike Chance and Dodge, Health, Magic Resistance, and Ability Power.

name: TFT_Item_Manazane
description: After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore Mana over 4 seconds.

name: TFT_Item_ObsidianCleaver
description: The wearer's basic attacks and spell damage shred enemy Armor and Magic Resistance for 3 seconds.

name: TFT_Item_RanduinsSanctum
description: At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain bonus Armor and bonus Magic Resistance for the rest of combat.

name: TFT_Item_RocketPropelledFist
description: At the start of combat, the wearer pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy.

name: TFT_Item_ZhonyasParadox
description: The first instance of damage that would reduce the wearer below 40% Health is prevented, causing them to become invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.

name: TFT_Item_LuminousDeathblade
description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: TFT_Item_DragonsWill
description: Grants bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from an Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Health.
radiantBonus: Regenerate percentage max Health per second

description: Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After a short delay, they return with restored Health and shed all negative effects.

description: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.

description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary Radiant items. [Consumes Three Item Slots]

description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Attack Speed and Lifesteal for the rest of combat.

name: TFT_Item_ZzrotInvitation
description: At the start of combat, a Radiant Voidmother with bonus Health and Attack Damage aries and taunts nearby enemies. Radiant Voidmothers that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.

name: TFT_Item_DragonBlessing
description: Use on a Dragonmancer to make them your Dragonmancer Hero

name: TFT_Item_DeterminedInvestor
description: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and 15 gold.

name: TFT_Item_DiamondHands
description: Once per combat at 66% and 33% Health, gain 1 gold and immunity for 2 seconds.

name: TFT_Item_DravensAxe
description: Gain 1 Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 80). Attacks grant 1 stack, up to 100 times. At full stacks, grant 10 gold and 1 item component.

name: TFT_Item_GamblersBlade
description: Gain 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 80). Each attack has a 4% chance to drop 1 gold.

name: TFT_Item_GoldmancersStaff
description: Gain 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 80) and a 40% chance to drop 2 gold on enemy kill.

name: TFT_Item_NeedlesslyBigGem
description: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 1% more damage per gold you have. For every 2 uints alive when this happens, gain 1 gold

name: TFT_Item_MogulsMail
description: Grant 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 10 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 50 times. At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

name: TFT_Item_CrownofChampions
description: Every 5 seconds, the next attack deals 9001x the amount of gold in your bank in true damage.
